outcome: Shadow Scoring: An unauthorized BCI scoring system begins issuing wildly fluctuating scores to residents, upending lives overnight. Trust erodes as friends and rivals rise and fall unpredictably. New social alliances form, protests break out, and the Council is forced to confront the legacy of flawed BCI pilots and Halden’s secretive adaptations.

events.description: Residents receive erratic BCI score updates—some marked as top-tier overnight, others suddenly demoted. Social order destabilizes as people try to adapt to sudden reversals in fortune.
Impromptu crowds gather in main squares, accusing the Council of manipulating the BCI for political gain. Clashes erupt as low-score citizens are denied transit and health services.
Anonymous messages circulate, leaking evidence that the rogue BCI is based on abandoned pilot algorithms. Residents blame both Halden and the Council for negligence and corruption.
Neighborhood coalitions coordinate mass score appeals, demanding transparency and rollback. Council factions accuse each other of exploiting the chaos. Tensions rise in political standoffs.
